Name: The Reindeer
Ingredients: Top up with Brut champagne/sparkling wine
Instructions: MUDDLE ginger in base of shaker. Add next three ingredients (all but champagne), SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. TOP with champagne. Spicy sugar syrup To make your own festive spice syrup: Stir half a cup of hot water and half a cup of sugar in a pan until sugar is dissolved. Add 1 cracked cinnamon stick, Â½ a split vanilla pod and 1 teaspoon of cracked Szechuan peppers. Cover for 15 minutes then strain and cool liquid. If using this syrup in the recipe below then use 12.5ml.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2016 by Ketel One Brand Ambassador, Dave Beatty.
